text:
A man climbed up a mobile tower on Monday in Kannamangalam and threatened to jump.

Adhi (40) of Kannamangalam who has a few petty cases booked against him reportedly consumed liquor with two of his friends on Sunday night and had a brawl with them.

With an intention to win over his friends, under the influence of liquor, he climbed a mobile phone tower near Kannamangalam new bus stand and called out to his friends.

He threatened that unless his friends came to the spot he would jump down and end his life.

Policemen who rushed to the spot brought his friends and Adhi climbed down.

He was warned by the police for his irresponsible act and let off. – Staff Reporter
title: Man threatens to jump from mobile tower
